content: Recently, I've been working on two projects. GetHealth is a start-up I joined as CTO last year which "is helping people become more healthy every day", with game-play incentivised mobile applications and health challenges for companies and groups. Anseo is a mobile application by Diaga, which in turn is a web and design shop I helped establish to work on various projects. Anseo is a location-aware chat and discovery application for Irish speakers and the Irish language community.
title: Working. Please Wait…
author: Michael Flanagan
